snippet: The announcement came as the number of cheating accusations has mounted, including one at the Cork Congress Chess Open in Ireland the led to an altercation in a bathroom.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column on Association of Chess Professionals announcement that the World Chess Federation has agreed to create committee to come up with ways to detect and stop cheating.
lead_paragraph: The announcement came as the number of cheating accusations has mounted, including one at the Cork Congress Chess Open in Ireland the led to an altercation in a bathroom.

headline.print_headline: Federation Agrees to Lead Effort Against Cheating
headline.seo: Chess: Federation to Lead Anti-Cheating Effort
headline.main: Federation Agrees to Lead Effort Against Cheating
